HowItWorks.title: How Microchips Save Lives
HowItWorks.subtitle: A simple technology that saves lives

step1.title: Permanent ID
step1.description: A rice-grain sized microchip is safely implanted under your pet's skin. It contains a unique ID number that lasts your pet's entire lifetime. No batteries, no maintenance needed.

step2.title: Instant Scanning
step2.description: Any veterinarian, animal shelter, or rescue organization can scan the chip with a simple handheld device. The scan takes seconds and immediately displays your pet's unique ID number.

step3.title: Database Lookup
step3.description: The ID number is searched in our registry database, which immediately provides your current contact information to the person who found your pet.

step4.title: Happy Reunion
step4.description: You receive an immediate notification that your pet has been found. Within hours (sometimes minutes), you're reunited with your beloved companion.

Stats.title: Why Microchips Beat Other ID Methods
Stats.subtitle: Collars and tags can fall off or become unreadable. Microchips are permanent.

collarTags.title: Collar & ID Tags
collarTags.textFade: Text can fade or become unreadable

petTattoos.title: Pet Tattoos
petTattoos.hardToRead: Hard to read if fur grows over it

Contact.responseNote: We'll respond to your message as soon as possible. Emergency inquiries are prioritized.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions
FAQ.question1: How quickly can you help find my lost pet?
FAQ.answer1: Our emergency access is 24/7. If your pet is microchipped and registered with us, we can provide owner contact information immediately to anyone who finds them. For lost pet reports, we activate our network within minutes.
FAQ.question2: What if my pet's microchip isn't registered with Chipthem?
FAQ.answer2: Register with us as soon as possible to protect your pet. We can assist with moving your pet's details from other registries and can help you locate the current registry your pet is registered with.
FAQ.question3: How much does your service cost?
FAQ.answer3: Registration is as little as 25 JDS. This includes database storage, 24/7 access, unlimited updates to your information, and emergency support services.
FAQ.question4: Can veterinary clinics access your database?
FAQ.answer4: Yes, licensed veterinary professionals have access to search our database when they find pets. They can also help register pets for clients who need assistance.

SuccessStoriesRecent.title: Recent Success Stories
SuccessStoriesRecent.subtitle: Real stories from real families reunited with their beloved pets

max.title: Max's Miracle Return
max.story: "Max slipped out during a thunderstorm and we were devastated. A kind stranger found him 8 km away and took him to a vet clinic. They scanned his microchip and called us within 2 hours! We can't thank Chipthem enough for bringing our boy home."
max.author: Sarah & Mike Johnson

luna.title: Luna's Journey Home
luna.story: "Luna went missing for 6 months. We had given up hope. Then animal control found her 32 km away! Her microchip was still working perfectly. She was thin but healthy. The microchip literally saved her life."
luna.author: Yazan Rashed & Yara Haddad

Bonduk.title: Bonduk's Second Chance
Bonduk.story: "Bonduk escaped during a move to our new house. We were frantic searching a neighborhood we barely knew. A week later, the shelter called - they had scanned his chip! Without it, we never would have found him in the new city."
Bonduk.author: Ahmad & Fatima Al-Zahra

milo.title: Milo's Adventure
milo.story: "Milo is an indoor cat who somehow got outside. Three days later, a neighbor found him hiding under their porch. The vet clinic scanned him and immediately found our information. Milo is safely home and we're so grateful!"
milo.author: Jennifer & Tom Wilson

SuccessStoriesMore.title: More Happy Endings
SuccessStoriesMore.subtitle: Brief snapshots of other successful reunions

Samur.name: Samur
Samur.story: Found at the park by joggers. Microchip led them straight to us!
Samur.author: Omar K.

whiskers.name: Whiskers
whiskers.story: Shelter called after 2 weeks. Microchip saved his life!
whiskers.author: Robert M.

rex.name: Rex
rex.story: Escaped during fireworks. Found by police the next morning.
rex.author: Layla S.

mittens.name: Mittens
mittens.story: Veterinarian 24 km away scanned her chip. So grateful!
mittens.author: Nour T.

charlie.name: Charlie
charlie.story: Neighbor found him and took to vet clinic. Quick reunion!
charlie.author: Michael L.

Zatar.name: Zatar
Zatar.story: Veterinarian 24 km away scanned her chip. So grateful!
Zatar.author: Rania R.

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: Chipthem Pet Microchip System ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website.

subsections.subtitle: Personal Information
subsections.description: We may collect personal information such as:

subsections.subtitle: Automatically Collected Information
subsections.description: When you visit our website, we automatically collect:

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
items: Providing and maintaining our microchip registration services
Facilitating pet reunions in case of loss
Sending important service updates and notifications
Responding to customer inquiries and support requests

sections.title: Information Sharing
sections.description: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with:
items: Veterinary clinics and animal shelters (for pet recovery purposes)
Service providers who assist in our operations
Legal authorities when required by law
Other parties with your explicit consent

sections.title: Data Security
sections.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.description: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights:
items: Right to access your personal information

sections.title: Cookies and Tracking
sections.content: Our website uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience. You can control cookie settings through your browser. Some cookies are essential for website functionality, while others help us understand user behavior and improve our services.

sections.title: Third-Party Links
sections.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of external sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party websites before providing your information.

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years old. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware of such collection, we will take steps to delete the information and terminate the child's account.

sections.title: Policy Changes
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated 'Last updated' date. Your continued use of our services following the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of such changes.

sections.title: International Data Transfers
sections.content: If you are located outside our primary jurisdiction, please be aware that your information may be transferred to, stored in, and processed in countries other than your country of residence. These countries may have data protection laws that differ from your home country.

sections.title: Data Protection Officer
sections.content: For specific privacy concerns or to exercise your data rights, you can reach out to our Data Protection team at the contact information provided above.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using the Chipthem Pet Microchip System website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

sections.title: Use License
sections.content: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on Chipthem's website for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
items: Use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
Attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on the website
Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials
Transfer the materials to another person or mirror the materials on any other server

sections.title: Disclaimer
sections.content: The materials on Chipthem's website are provided on an 'as is' basis. Chipthem makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

sections.title: Limitations
sections.content: In no event shall Chipthem or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on Chipthem's website, even if Chipthem or an authorized representative has been notified orally or in writing of the possibility of such damage.

sections.title: Accuracy of Materials
sections.content: The materials appearing on Chipthem's website could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Chipthem does not warrant that any of the materials on the website are accurate, complete, or current. Chipthem may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice.

sections.title: Links
sections.content: Chipthem has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by Chipthem of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk.

sections.title: Modifications
sections.content: Chipthem may revise these terms of service for its website at any time without notice. By using this website, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.

sections.title: Governing Law
sections.content: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Chipthem operates, and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in that location.

sections.title: Contact Information
sections.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:
